-i am unable to install mumble after 2 months ago when i had to update to 1.2.4. I tried completely uninstalling the program and reinstalling it but then it says it is unable to install it do to other files having access and i need to close those out before being able to install mumble
+I am unable to install mumble after 2 months ago when i had to update to 1.2.4. I tried completely uninstalling the program and reinstalling it but then it says it is unable to install it due to other files having access and I need to close those out before being able to install mumble

- **status**: open --> awaiting-reply
- **Targeted Release**: 1.2.4 --> unspecified

#1041 unable to reinstall mumble

If it is the installer message because of the overlay it provides you the option that it be closed, does it not?

Did you try installing to a different folder?

Otherwise, please provide a screenshot / the exact error and options provided.
